Title: Patriotic production campaign on the grasslands (The Inner Mongolia People's Autonomous Government rewards model workers in animal husbandry with excellent breeds of cows)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社), Beijing
Notes: The model worker on the left in the long cloak has received a cow and a calf as a reward, along with a rosette, a medal, a diploma and a pennant.
